All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Action
 
ActionFactory
Factory class which creates needed actions based on user input
AllInAction
All-In bet Action - means that player bet all the money they have.
BalanceAction
Balance action - sends Player back his actual balance
CallAction
Call Action - means that Player bets the same amount as others.
Card
Representation of Single Card
CardSuits
Representation of CardSuit
CardValues
 
ChangeAction
Change cards Action - means that players change fixed number of their cards
ChannelController
Handles read and write operations on SocketChannel
CheckAction
Check Action means that Player can check as long as anybody bets.
Client
Client class Responsible for connecting to server, retrieving playerID, handling write and creating Thread which handles asynchronous read from a server
ClientThread
Responsible for asynchronous read from server
CreateGameAction
Creates game action - creates Game on server with specified ANTE
Deck
Deck representation - 52 cards without Jokers
EmptyDeckException
 
FoldAction
Fold Action means that Player do not want to play during this round anymore.
Game
Wrapper responsible for all meta-actions connected with game - creating, joining/quitting players, setting host etc.
GameController
Class responsible for poker logic
GameController.possibleRoundStates
 
GameNotStartedException
 
GameThread
Thread in which game will be processed
Hand
Poker hand representation, contains cards with its priorities and seniority
HandChecker
Utility class used to check hand seniority
HandEntry
Card wrapper - adds priority to card
HandSeniority
HandSeniority representation.
HelpAction
Help Action shows list of available actions
IllegalActionException
 
IntValidator
Utility class to validate if string literal can be converted to POSITIVE integer.
InvalidShortcutException
 
InvalidSlugException
 
JoinGameAction
Join Action allows Player to join selected game
ListGamesAction
List Games Action shows list of available games with number of people in lobby, ante and current game state
MessageBuilder
Utility class meant to prepare all mesage for users
MessageController
Controlls to which players message should be sent
NoSuchActionException
 
NoSuchPlayerException
 
Player
 
PlayerHand
Wrapper for Hand class, contains information about user whom the hand belongs to
PlayerWrapper
Wrapper of Player class, contains gameID
QuitGameAction
 
RaiseAction
Raise Action means that Player raises the current bet.
Server
Class responsible for creating and running poker server
ServerAction
 
ServerActionFactory
Factory class which creates needed actions based on user input
StartGameAction
 
UsedViaReflection
Marks method/variable which is invoked by reflection
